channel.title: Google Analytics on @PSUStevens Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Google Analytics on @PSUStevens Blog

item.title: Building a Blog With Hugo - Part 4
item.description: In the previous post, I covered how to customize the theme for your Hugo site. I apologize if it was a bit long. This post is considerably shorter. In this post, I’m going to walk through how to configure Google Analytics for your site. Let’s get started. Before we get started… If you are already familiar with Google Analytics, then this will be a short read for you.
